section.name: One time setup instructions for working with Apache UIMA source code
section.p:
Here you will find information on how to set up various tools used in working with UIMA source code, including:
SVN
Maven
Eclipse
Docbkx - a Maven plugin for processing Docbook files

section.name: One time setup for SVN
section.p: Install an svn client (not server) to use for command line invocation of SVN from http://subversion.apache.org/packages.html. Use the 1.6.x or later version. For Windows platform, you may find it convenient to also install a windows shell extension for this, such as the one from Tigris.org.
If you are using an IDE, you should obtain the SVN client for that IDE.

ol.li: Download Maven 3.0 beta-1 or later from http://maven.apache.org/download.html.
Set up your path to use this version.

Add the following environment variable for Maven:
Variable name: MAVEN_OPTS
Value: -Xmx800m -XX:MaxPermSize=256m

section.name: One time setup for Eclipse
section.p:
Install a current Eclipse (these instructions tested with Eclipse 3.5.2). Then:
Install the SVN support plugin Subclipse from http://subclipse.tigris.org/. Be sure to pick the version for 1.6.x SVN client.
Install m2Eclipse 0.10.0 or later from http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/.
Version 0.10.0 has a bug which prevents projects which use XMLBeans from compiling. Until this is fixed, install this "update" after installing the base:
Download https://cit-server.cit.tu-berlin.de/~battre/org.maven.ide.eclipse.site-0.10.1-SNAPSHOT-site.zip
unzip it locally
add the directory as a local "Software Site" in "Help -> Install New Software"
update the m2eclipse with "Help -> Check for Updates"
For more details about this bug, see https://issues.sonatype.org/browse/MNGECLIPSE-1694.
Use Eclipse Preferences -> Maven -> Installations to add the Maven 3.0-beta-1 (or later) installation as the default to use.

section.name: One time setup for using the Docbkx Maven plugin
section.p:
A patch is needed to get get the Maven Docbkx plugin to work with Maven 3:
use m2Eclipse to checkout http://docbkx-tools.googlecode.com/svn/tags/docbkx-2.0.10/docbkx-maven-base project
Edit line 472 of AbstractTransformerMojo.java, where it says ...getResources("/catalog.xml") and remove the / in front of catalog.xml.
do a mvn install in the docbkx-maven-base directory, to install the fix to your local repo.
If you're interested in knowing more about this bug, see http://code.google.com/p/docbkx-tools/issues/detail?id=52.
